verses.verse: Now these <S%H428><s%> are [the records of] the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> (that is, Edom <S%H9000><s%>).

Esau <S%H6215><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> his wives <S%H802><s%> from the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Canaan: <S%H3667><s%> Adah <S%H5711><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Elon <S%H356><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> and Oholibamah <S%H173><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Anah <S%H6034><s%> and the granddaughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zibeon <S%H6649><s%> the Hivite; <S%H2340><s%>
also Basemath, <S%H1315><s%> Ishmael's daughter, <S%H1323><s%> the sister <S%H269><s%> of Nebaioth. <S%H5032><s%>
And Adah <S%H5711><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> to Esau, <S%H6215><s%> and Basemath <S%H1315><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Reuel, <S%H7467><s%>

and Oholibamah <S%H173><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Jeush <S%H3266><s%> and Jalam <S%H3281><s%> and Korah. <S%H7141><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> to him in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

Then Esau <S%H6215><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> his wives <S%H802><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his daughters <S%H1323><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his household, <S%H1004><s%> and his livestock <S%H4735><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his cattle <S%H929><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his goods <S%H7075><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had acquired <S%H7408><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> to [another] land <S%H776><s%> away from his brother <S%H251><s%> Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

For their property <S%H7399><s%> had become <S%H1961><s%> too <S%H4480><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> for them to live <S%H3427><s%> together, <S%H9191><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> where <S%H4033><s%> they sojourned <S%H4033><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not sustain <S%H5375><s%> them because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of their livestock. <S%H4735><s%>
So Esau <S%H6215><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Seir; <S%H8165><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> is Edom. <S%H9000><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> then are [the records of] the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> the father of the Edomites <S%H1><s%> in the hill <S%H9000><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Seir. <S%H2022><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of Esau's sons: <S%H1121><s%> Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Esau's wife <S%H802><s%> Adah, <S%H5711><s%> Reuel <S%H7467><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Esau's wife <S%H802><s%> Basemath. <S%H1315><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> were Teman, <S%H8487><s%> Omar, <S%H201><s%> Zepho <S%H6825><s%> and Gatam <S%H1609><s%> and Kenaz. <S%H7073><s%>

And Timna <S%H8555><s%> was a concubine <S%H6370><s%> of Esau's son <S%H1121><s%> Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> Amalek <S%H6002><s%> to Eliphaz. <S%H464><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau's wife <S%H802><s%> Adah. <S%H5711><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuel: <S%H7467><s%> Nahath <S%H5184><s%> and Zerah, <S%H2226><s%> Shammah <S%H8048><s%> and Mizzah. <S%H4199><s%> These <S%H428><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau's wife <S%H802><s%> Basemath. <S%H1315><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> Oholibamah, <S%H173><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Anah <S%H6034><s%> and the granddaughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zibeon: <S%H6649><s%> she bore <S%H3205><s%> to Esau, Jeush <S%H3266><s%> and Jalam <S%H3281><s%> and Korah. <S%H7141><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the chiefs <S%H441><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau. <S%H6215><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliphaz, <S%H464><s%> the first-born of Esau, <S%H6215><s%> are chief <S%H441><s%> Teman, <S%H8487><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Omar, <S%H201><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Zepho, <S%H6825><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Kenaz, <S%H7073><s%>

chief <S%H441><s%> Korah, <S%H7141><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Gatam, <S%H1609><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Amalek. <S%H6002><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the chiefs <S%H441><s%> descended from Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom; <S%H9000><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Adah. <S%H5711><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuel, <S%H7467><s%> Esau's son: <S%H1121><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Nahath, <S%H5184><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Zerah, <S%H2226><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Shammah, <S%H8048><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Mizzah. <S%H4199><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the chiefs <S%H441><s%> descended from Reuel <S%H7467><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom; <S%H9000><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau's wife <S%H802><s%> Basemath. <S%H1315><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau's wife <S%H802><s%> Oholibamah: <S%H173><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Jeush, <S%H3266><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Jalam, <S%H3281><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Korah. <S%H7141><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the chiefs <S%H441><s%> descended from Esau's wife <S%H802><s%> Oholibamah, <S%H173><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Anah. <S%H6034><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> (that is, Edom <S%H9000><s%>), and these <S%H428><s%> are their chiefs. <S%H441><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Seir <S%H8165><s%> the Horite, <S%H2752><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land: <S%H776><s%> Lotan <S%H3877><s%> and Shobal <S%H7732><s%> and Zibeon <S%H6649><s%> and Anah, <S%H6034><s%>

and Dishon <S%H1787><s%> and Ezer <S%H687><s%> and Dishan. <S%H1789><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the chiefs <S%H441><s%> descended from the Horites, <S%H2752><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Seir <S%H8165><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom. <S%H9000><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Lotan <S%H3877><s%> were Hori <S%H2752><s%> and Hemam; <S%H1950><s%> and Lotan's sister <S%H269><s%> was Timna. <S%H8555><s%>
And these <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shobal: <S%H7732><s%> Alvan <S%H5935><s%> and Manahath <S%H4506><s%> and Ebal, <S%H5858><s%> Shepho <S%H8195><s%> and Onam. <S%H208><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zibeon: <S%H6649><s%> Aiah <S%H345><s%> and Anah <S%H6034><s%> â€“ he is the Anah <S%H6034><s%> who <S%H834><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> the hot <S%H3222><s%> springs <S%H3222><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> when he was pasturing <S%H7462><s%> the donkeys <S%H2543><s%> of his father Zibeon. <S%H1><s%>
And these <S%H428><s%> are the children <S%H1121><s%> of Anah: <S%H6034><s%> Dishon, <S%H1787><s%> and Oholibamah, <S%H173><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Anah. <S%H6034><s%>
And these <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dishon: <S%H1787><s%> Hemdan <S%H2533><s%> and Eshban <S%H790><s%> and Ithran <S%H3506><s%> and Cheran. <S%H3763><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ezer: <S%H687><s%> Bilhan <S%H1092><s%> and Zaavan <S%H2190><s%> and Akan. <S%H6130><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dishan: <S%H1789><s%> Uz <S%H5780><s%> and Aran. <S%H765><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the chiefs <S%H441><s%> descended from the Horites: <S%H2752><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Lotan, <S%H3877><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Shobal, <S%H7732><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Zibeon, <S%H6649><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Anah, <S%H6034><s%>

chief <S%H441><s%> Dishon, <S%H1787><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Ezer, <S%H687><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Dishan. <S%H1789><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the chiefs <S%H441><s%> descended from the Horites, <S%H2752><s%> according to their [various] chiefs <S%H441><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Seir. <S%H8165><s%>

Now these <S%H428><s%> are the kings <S%H4428><s%> who <S%H834><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom <S%H9000><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> any king <S%H4428><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> over the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
Bela <S%H1106><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Edom, <S%H9000><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> was Dinhabah. <S%H1838><s%>

Then Bela <S%H1106><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and Jobab <S%H3103><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%> of Bozrah <S%H1224><s%> became <S%H4427><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> in his place. <S%H8478><s%>
Then Jobab <S%H3103><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and Husham <S%H2367><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of the Temanites <S%H8489><s%> became <S%H4427><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> in his place. <S%H8478><s%>

Then Husham <S%H2367><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and Hadad <S%H1908><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bedad, <S%H911><s%> who defeated <S%H5221><s%> Midian <S%H4080><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> became <S%H4427><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> in his place; <S%H8478><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> was Avith. <S%H5762><s%>
Then Hadad <S%H1908><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and Samlah <S%H8072><s%> of Masrekah <S%H4957><s%> became <S%H4427><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> in his place. <S%H8478><s%>

Then Samlah <S%H8072><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and Shaul <S%H7586><s%> of Rehoboth <S%H7344><s%> on the [Euphrates] River <S%H5104><s%> became <S%H4427><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> in his place. <S%H8478><s%>
Then Shaul <S%H7586><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and Baal-hanan the son <S%H1121><s%> of Achbor <S%H5907><s%> became <S%H4427><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> in his place. <S%H8478><s%>

Then Baal-hanan the son <S%H1121><s%> of Achbor <S%H5907><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and Hadar <S%H1924><s%> became <S%H4427><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> in his place; <S%H8478><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> was Pau; <S%H6464><s%> and his wife's name <S%H8034><s%> was Mehetabel, <S%H4105><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Matred, <S%H4308><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Mezahab. <S%H4314><s%>

Now these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the chiefs <S%H441><s%> descended from Esau, <S%H6215><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> [and] their localities, <S%H4725><s%> by their names: <S%H8034><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Timna, <S%H8555><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Alvah, <S%H5933><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Jetheth, <S%H3509><s%>
chief <S%H441><s%> Oholibamah, <S%H173><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Elah, <S%H425><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Pinon, <S%H6373><s%>
chief <S%H441><s%> Kenaz, <S%H7073><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Teman, <S%H8487><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Mibzar, <S%H4014><s%>

chief <S%H441><s%> Magdiel, <S%H4025><s%> chief <S%H441><s%> Iram. <S%H5902><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the chiefs <S%H441><s%> of Edom <S%H9000><s%> (that is, Esau, <S%H6215><s%> the father of the Edomites <S%H1><s%>), according to their habitations <S%H9000><s%> in the land <S%H4186><s%> of their possession. <S%H776><s%>
